name: questions_and_answers
description: This project allows users to ask and answer questions about everything. This system is running at https://questions-and-answers-salc.herokuapp.com/ with open code at Github. This project uses: - NodeJS - EJS (Embedded JavaScript) templates lib - Express lib - Body-parser lib - Sequelize lib - Remote MySQL Server - Bootstrap libs - Git repository - Heroku hosting
author: Sidartha Carvalho
